title: Beramno kan fak ang
lyrics:
Mithianghlimte lenna Beram no khawpuiah,
Ka tlantu hmel duhawm ka hmu ang, lawmtakin;
Chutah buaina leh sualna vanga ka rumna zawng,
Ka chhandamtu hnenah ka thlen ang.

Chatuanin, aw, ka fak ning lo’ng,
Chutah van angel leh serafim zawng te nen;
Hlimtakin kan leng ang, thlarau chawlhna ramah,
Chatuanin Beram no kan fak ang.

Beram no thisen hlua tlansa te zawng chuan,
Chatuanin hlim takin Chhandamtu chu fakin;
Lungngaih buaina leh hreawmna tuar tawh lo in,
Chatuanin beram no an fak ang.

Chatuanin chu ramah hmangaih lungduh te nen,
Hla mawi ropui remin bang lovin kan fak ang;
“A thianghlim e,” tiin chhun leh zan chawl lovin,
Chatuanin Beram no kan fak ang.
